name: Hosting Space
overview:
A web hosting company devoted to its customers.

Hosting Space is a web hosting company devoted to one goal to provide high quality hosting services to its customers. We provide The whole range of services in one place starting from shared hosting to VPS and Semi Dedicated hosting and domain registry and protection.

Out Data center is located in Germany and provides great performance for most high traffic regions - Europe, North America and Asia. Our Business Hosting Plans are the top rated solution for every business owner. We provide great technical support 99,9% uptime guaranteed and great prices. If you are not completely satisfied we offer 30 days money back period - that is how certain we are in the quality of the hosting solutions we provide. Check us out at: http://hosting-space.net
